mapper.insert:
insert into room_info (id, hotel_id, room_type_id, room_code, room_name, room_type, room_bed_infos, broadnet_type, max_occupancy, area_range, floor_range, has_window, extra_bed_fee, bath_room_type, breakfast_type, advance_day, advance_time, stay_nights, is_can_cancel, order_affirm_type, status, person_info_type, is_need_name, is_need_phone, is_need_idcard, is_need_email, creator_id, create_time, modified_id, modified_time, is_visible, is_deleted) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hotelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roomBedInfos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.broadnetType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.maxOccupancy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.areaRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.floorRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.hasWindow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.extraBedFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.bathRoomType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.breakfastType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.advanceDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.advanceTime}, #{item.stayNights,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isCanCancel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.orderAffirmType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.personInfoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isNeedName,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isNeedPhone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isNeedIdcard,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isNeedEmail,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifiedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.isVisible,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.delete: update room_info set is_deleted = 1 where id = #{roomId}
